byline.contributor: Jesse McKinley contributed reporting from Cadyville and Lisa Foderaro from New York City.

abstract: Search teams looking for escaped convicts Richard Matt and David Sweat in heavily wooded land near Clinton Correctional Facility in upstate New York find area's inhospitable conditions complicating their efforts; density of forest, insects and hot, humid weather present a challenge for even those with extensive outdoor skills; given that neither fugitive has much outdoor experience, conditions may ultimately work in favor of law enforcement.
lead_paragraph: The woods being searched for two escaped inmates are inhospitable in ways that could make finding food, water and shelter a challenge but also complicate efforts to track them down.

headline.main: In Search for Escapees, Voracious Bugs, Poisonous Plants and Muddy Woods
headline.print_headline: In Search for Escapees, Voracious Bugs, Poisonous Plants and Muddy Woods

snippet: The woods being searched for two escaped inmates are inhospitable in ways that could make finding food, water and shelter a challenge but also complicate efforts to track them down.
